content: Total Q2 net sales increased 3.1% versus last year with adjusted EBITDA at $54.1 million, a 35.4% decline to prior year. During the second quarter of 2022, we generated net sales of $479 million and adjusted EBITDA of $54.1 million. Net sales of Clabber Girl increased by $1.5 million or 8.7% during the quarter, driven by price increases. Selling, general and administrative expenses decreased by $2.9 million or 6.1% to $44.2 million in the second quarter of 2022, compared to $47.1 million in the second quarter of last year.
